channel.title: Compiler Problem?
channel.description:
My compiler code:
@echo off @TITLE Compile Server - HighTivity if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. :end echo Finished! pause exit
I have the correct environmental variables and whatnot. Does this mean I compiled correctly? [img]http://i.imgur.com/c8t1D.png[/img] I am also up to date with JDK & java.

item.title: Compiler Problem?
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

k try this

@echo off Title Compile Server "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_02\bin\ javac.exe" *java pause

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler Problem?

item.description:

My compiler code:

Please download it at the site that is about to load. :end echo Finished! pause exit

I have the correct environmental variables and whatnot.

Does this mean I compiled correctly?

I am also up to date with JDK & java.
